name: Drive Jump
description:
One of the most addictive and entertaining physics-based driving games ever made! And it's free! Do you want to be an aspiring uphill racer? With the respect to the laws of physics, you will not rest until you conquer the hills, off-road challenges, face any climbing environments. This hill climb racing game is for professional hill climb race game lovers. 

Gain bonuses and collect coins to continue checkpoints and reach even higher distances. 

Hit left and right buttons to move back and forward and tap to shoot. Shoot all obstacles to pave your way through challenges and explore hidden road tracks. 

This driving game is derived from real physics, so do not fall from moving platforms, pitfalls, trampolines, ramps, and many others. There are also hidden worlds where you can collect coins from. Push through obstacles to fill holes and resolve fun challenges. 

You can never run out of gasoline, but you can run out of options if you do not collect coins or take advantage of the coin packs to make your life easier. 

If you want to kill some time and have fun, then you've come to the right place. Drive Jump is an offroad driving game with shooting capabilities to go through each challenge along the way. This is not just a simple driving game, it's challenging and puzzling at some instances, but it has insanely addictive gameplay with 4 different world tracks to choose from. 

Become a legendary offload driver, race hard or go home. Jump over ramps and fly over variety of obstacles to take to the next level. 

Features: 
- Innovative driving gameplay design that is entertaining and addictive.
- Real physics driving game: gravity, air drag, etc. 
- Jump off ramps, platforms to move across spikes, obstacles and holes
- Shoot or move boxes, balls, etc. 
- Vehicle flips when possible
- 4x4 offroad game
- Moving platforms to get across
- Different road tracks to choose from
- Complete each road track to go to the next. On the last track, the road is endless.
- Avoid falling arrows, moving spikes, shooting cannons, flying bombers, helicopters and more

You have never played a driving game like this! Drive Jump is free to play but there are optional in-app purchases available for better driving game experience!

Challenge your friends. It's free!
